mean_en: (of a document, an agreement, etc.) to be no longer valid because the period of time for which it could be used has ended; (of a period of time, especially one during which somebody holds a position of authority) to end
sentence: This card is already expired, so let me cut it up for you.
sentence_trans: 这张卡已经到期了，让我帮你剪掉吧。
word_etyma: ex出 + pir=spir呼吸 + e强调 → 只出气不进气 → expire断气；期满
